items.text:
# Instructions

Reverse a string

For example:
input: "cool"
output: "looc"

####

Use the above instructions to modify the supplied files: reverse_string.py
Keep and implement the existing function or class stubs, they will be called from unit tests.
Do not implement or change any unit tests.
Only use standard python libraries, don't suggest installing any packages.
Here is how I would modify the `reverse_string.py` file:

This modification uses Python's slice notation to create a reversed copy of the input string. The `[::-1]` means start at the end of the string and end at position 0, move with the step -1 which essentially reverses the string.
